snippet.title: Assassin's Creed: Multiplayer Rearmed Trailer
snippet.description:
Ubisoft's portable multiplayer Assassin's Creed "Rearmed" is now here for the Apple iPad, iPhone, and iPod. Kill your target while on the go!
Get more Rearmed at IGN:
http://wireless.ign.com/objects/120/120888.html
